name: Super Wobbly Tennis
description:
READ THIS PLEASE:

CONTROLS:

Initial Service: Hold Space bar button and release 

Movement: AWSD - Arrow keys

To Click On buttons: Left mouse click

TIPS:

Get in the circle to be able to  hit the ball with more power, but also control where the ball is going. You can aim once in the circle by using AWSD/Arrow keys. As you go through games it gets harder and harder. 

EXTRA:

Currently only the endless mode is available, but I'm planning two other game modes and a few more game mechanics.

This is a project I started not too long ago and wanted to have it playable. I plan on updating this game to have more features and fix bugs. Suggestions and constructive criticisms are more than welcome. This game will always be FREE, but I appreciate small donations as it allow me to not take on as much work and focus on creating games. Thank you for your time and have fun!
